Name: Ha_Bits
About the game: In a simulation, programs delicate coexistence is coming to an end. Virus rise and many sectors are being destroyed. Lead, a shattered program with a lost purpose, will have to take the fight against them and a shadowy organization; even if it means, dealing with her past mistakes. Seeking answers in the very end, Lead will get to know the best and the worst of Ha_Bits town and its inhabitants, and their connection with the mysterious Overclock; when time runs out and only seven cycles remain. Features: A survival horror Metroidvania featuring two different worlds to be explored, the haunting and beautiful Ha_Bits town and the Overclock: a dangerous plane of existence that keeps many secrets and knowledge. Two different game modes connected to tell the story and integrated on the gameâ€™s world. Dress up to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. Each with unique powers and skills. Original art and soundtrack to entertain you up to the end of cycles. A story full of mysteries and riddles to be solved on the simulation. A cute cat to save your game! :3
